name: Galactic Fighter
description: Galactic Fighter is a 2D shooter where you have to fight against enemy spaceships. On the way, you will become big and strong but killing the bosses will not be so easy. Perform missions and earn money which you can use to buy modules or upgrade the ship.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel® Pentium® III or higher Graphics: Compatible with DirectX DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later Processor: Intel® Pentium® IV or higher Graphics: Compatible with DirectX DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
